data.title: MassHire Franklin Hampshire Career Center
data.meta_description: MassHire Franklin Hampshire Career Center provides employment and training services at no charge to job seekers and employers in Franklin County, Hampshire County, and the North Quabbin area.
data.text:
Resumes That Rock

1:00pm–2:15pm

Forbes Library (20 West St., Northampton, MA)

Do you want your resume to get noticed and make it past Applicant Tracking Systems? (Never heard of ATS? We'll cover that, too!) Learn about three types of resumes and which one is the best choice for you. We'll also talk about strengthening your application with accomplishment statements and how to make your resume look professional and up-to-date! Register on JobQuest or call the Greenfield office at 800-457-2603 or 413-774-4361 to sign up.

Resume or Cover Letter Consultations

1:30pm–3:30pm

MassHire Career Center (101 Munson St., Suite 210, 2nd Floor, Greenfield)

Meet with a workshop facilitator who will give you feedback on the content and format of your resume OR your cover letter content. 30-minute sessions can be conducted using the Zoom platform or in person; be ready with your particular questions. Prerequisite: must participate in relevant webinar beforehand. For Cover Letter Consultation, it is essential to have a job posting ready. Sign up the day before by calling the Greenfield office at 800-457-2603 or 413-774-4361. Appointments are at 9:45, 10:30, and 11:15am. If you choose to meet through Zoom, you will receive an invitation and instructions on how to participate. If you would like to meet in person, please let us know when you call.

Resumes That Rock

10:00am–11:15am

MassHire Career Center (101 Munson St., 2nd fl., Greenfield)

This is a virtual workshop, so you can join us from anywhere! Do you want your resume to get noticed and make it past Applicant Tracking Systems? (Never heard of ATS? We'll cover that, too!) Learn about three types of resumes and which one is the best choice for you. We'll also talk about strengthening your application with accomplishment statements and how to make your resume look professional and up-to-date! Register on JobQuest or call the Greenfield office at 800-457-2603 or 413-774-4361 by 4pm the day before to sign up. Instructions on how to join the workshop through Zoom will be provided separately.
